full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement - Cord, Fibrous**
=====================================================

## Tender Information
-------------------

* **Tender Reference Number:** PW-23-01020239
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** W8482-231048/B
* **Publication Date:** 2023-01-05
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-10T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-02-08

## Procurement Details
--------------------

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of cord, fibrous (GSIN: N4020). The requested quantities are as follows:

* Item 1: 2,194.56 units (MR, Ship-to: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia)
* Item 2: 1,463.04 units (MR, Ship-to: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)

Bidders may offer equivalent or substitute products, indicating the brand name and model, or part number and NCAGE. Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids are not acceptable.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers at any time.

## Mandatory Documents
---------------------

Bidders are required to download and review the following documents:

* RFP W8482-231048_en.pdf (English)
* RFP W8482-231048_fr.pdf (French)
* Amendment 001 W8482-231048_b.pdf (English)
* Amendment 001 W8482-231048_b_fr.pdf (French)
* Amendment 002 W8482-231048_b_en.pdf (English)
* Amendment 002 W8482-231048_b_fr.pdf (French)
* Amendment 003 W8482-231048_b.pdf (English)

## Contact Information
-------------------

* **Name:** Katerina Drescher
* **Email:** katerina.drescher@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** None
* **Fax:** None
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

## Additional Information
----------------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown may require clarification or additional information from bidders at any time.
